participant_1.background:
I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
i m in a jazz band and play the saxophone.
my family is very important to me.
i like movies based on comedies.
I work long hours in the sun and my eyes get tired.

participant_2.background:
I remember playing the violin for my family at the holidays and seeing the look on their faces as they listened.
i feel that i can t live up to many people s standards.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives.

content.text: I'm not a big fan of the sun, it makes my eyes tired.
I used to hate the sun too, but then I dyed my hair fire engine red, and now I'm obsessed with it!
What's your reason for the red hair?
It makes me feel like I can take on anything.
I can see why. It's definitely bold.
Thanks! It's also a great conversation starter.
I bet. What kind of music do you like?
I love Jason Mraz. His music is so calming and helps me cope with the loss of my parents.
I'm sorry to hear about your loss. I can see how his music could be therapeutic.
Yeah, it really is. I also like to play the violin for my family.
That's so sweet. I bet they love it when you play for them.
They do. It's one of my favorite ways to show my love for them.
That's great. Music is such a powerful thing.
It is. It can make you feel all sorts of emotions.
I'm glad you have something that brings you joy.
